grate.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the metal bars and frame that hold the wood, coal etc in a fireplace
grate.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to rub cheese, vegetables etc against a rough or sharp surface in order to break them into small pieces
grate.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to talk in a low rough voice
grate.translation[1].definitions[2].exam: Mr Fen had a loud voice that grated on her ears.
grate.translation[1].definitions[3].defi: to make an unpleasant sound by rubbing, or to make something do this
grate.translation[1].definitions[3].exam: The stones beneath her shoes grated harshly.
